title: Is it fatal to drink 3 cans of Red Bull energy drink after getting the covid vaccine?
description: Answer (1 of 15): No. You need to drink exactly 4.215 cans of Red Bull and get the AstraZeneca vaccine for it to be fatal. With the Pfizer vaccine it is exactly 3.9003 cans of Red Bull for that to be fatal. With a placebo vaccine you need to drink exactly 2.1194 cans of Red Bull for it to be fa...
